title: "IonQ Demonstrates World-First Quantum Cognition Models"
excerpt: "IonQ (NYSE: IONQ), an industry leader in quantum computing, today announced results from its early research into applying quantum computers for modeling human cognition. The recently published paper describes the world's first publicly known method in which basic human cognition models have been run on quantum hardware,"
